title: 求救~帮忙看看崩溃报告·启动游戏加载到initializing mods phease 1时候闪退
author: nancyyezi
txt_content:
救命啊~ 有几天没玩了，后来加了个材质包进去，不知怎的就变这样了，删了材质包还是这样
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Who set us up the TNT?

replies.author: nancyyezi
replies.txt_content: 我新手呀，好不容易筹齐了金粒

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: 1a2s3d4f1
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 1a2s3d4f1 于 2018-9-17 22:40 编辑 

你的java是7还是8的
Unsupported major.minor version 52.0
要使用java8才能用拔刀剑

replies.author: lilinjie
replies.txt_content:
把你的java7换成java8就好了
拔刀剑需要java8
